document.full_text: u.s. health regulators have issued a warning letter to german healthcare conglomerate fresenius se for unauthorized design changes in its dialysis device, combiset, before its sale in the united states.
document.title: fda issues warning letter to fresenius on dialysis
lines_and_colors: u.s. health regulators have issued a warning letter to german healthcare conglomerate fresenius se for unauthorized design changes in its dialysis device, combiset, before its sale in the united states.
